subject: Hi,

Well, looks like David the spirit tech might be right here, he says we'll  
have two suns, and a new earth, unless, one of the suns will die and create 
a  new earth in that way, it's going to be when You know who returns for the 
1000  year reign before last judgement.  He's going to give all a second 
chance  to repent. sf
 
_http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZRGEU0CE4Ik&feature=feedu_ 
(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZRGEU0CE4Ik&feature=feedu)
